> 
> 	Bonecrusher looks at his fellow constructicons, mildly 
> confused, "Uhh, so that means we are staying here? Cause I'm 
> gonna." He walks over to Hook. Looks at the damaged bot, and 
> frowns.


::LONG HAUL::

    LH lowered himself to the ground after insuring Hook was stable.
    "I say yes, but that's up to the rest of us. I want to check out 
Megatron. He was superb athletically and mentally. I say we probe him 
further." He said that with a snort and a nodd of his head.


Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
